de.rincewind.api.gui.components

Interface Sizeable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ElementBrick, ElementButton, ElementCounter, ElementItem, ElementList<T>, ElementMap<T>, ElementMultiButton, ElementSizeable, ElementSwitcher<T>, WindowPointer, WindowSizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftElementBrick, CraftElementButton, CraftElementCounter, CraftElementItem, CraftElementList, CraftElementMap, CraftElementMultiButton, CraftElementSizeable, CraftElementSwitcher, CraftWindowPointer, CraftWindowSizeable, Elements.ElementBrickExtendable, Elements.ElementButtonExtendable, Elements.ElementCounterExtendable, Elements.ElementItemExtendable, Elements.ElementListExtendable, Elements.ElementSizeableExtendable, Elements.ElementSwitcherExtendable, TestWindow, WindowConfirm, WindowFileBrowser, Windows.WindowPointerExtendable, Windows.WindowSizeableExtendable

    public interface Sizeable
    This interface is implemented when your are able to change the size of that object.
    Since:
    2.3.3
    Author:
    Rincewind34
    See Also:
    ElementSizeable, WindowSizeable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of this object.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of this object.
      boolean isInside(Point point)
      Returns true if a specified point is in the frame of the width and the height and false if not.
      void setSize(int width, int higth)
      Sets the size of this element.

      • isInside

        boolean isInside(Point point)
        Returns true if a specified point is in the frame of the width and the height and false if not.
        Parameters:
        point - to check
        Returns:
        true if a specified point is in the frame of the width and the height and false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the point is null

      • setSize

        void setSize(int width,
             int higth)
        Sets the size of this element.
        Parameters:
        width - to set
        higth - to set
        Throws:
        InvalidSizeException - if the size is invalid for this object
